snippet.title: Guitar Hero: World Tour full band $90 via Amazon
snippet.description: ...Guitar Hero: World Tour comes in a big, heavy box. There are multiple Hero games coming... Rock Band and Guitar Hero sale, and today Amazon is featuring Guitar Hero: World Tour as the deal... Tour drums beat the Rock Band drums hands down, but that's pure opinion. snippet.title: The Eagles land in Guitar Hero: World Tour
snippet.description: ...Just in case Hotel California wasnt enough to satiate your desire for The Eagles, Activision has announced a new track pack that will be bringing three more classic rock tunes to Guitar Hero: World Tour. The new DLC joins the ranks of Nirvana and The Smashing Pumpkins, both of whom had similar...

snippet.title: The Raconteurs join Guitar Hero: World Tour line-up
snippet.description: ...This time around it looks like Activision is actually going to fulfill its promise to consistently add new downloadable songs to Guitar Hero: World Tour. After releasing a Jimi Hendrix track pack last week, they are doing the same for the Jack White-fronted band The Raconteurs. The content pack...

snippet.title: More Hendrix songs released for Guitar Hero: World Tour
snippet.description: ...Jimi Hendrix, the man Rolling Stone Magazine declared to be the greatest guitar player of all time, is adding more songs to Activisions newest Guitar Hero entry. Microsofts Major Nelson announced today that the original and greatest of axe men is coming to Guitar Hero: World Tour with an exclusive...

snippet.title: Guitar Hero: World Tour launch DLC detailed
snippet.description: ...One of the major selling points of Rock Band over Guitar Hero has been the games extensive library of downloadable content. With the upcoming GH: World Tour, Activision is hoping to change that by providing a steady stream of downloadable songs. In addition to the strong on-disc track list for GH...
